  1. Description

Annotation Interface Loader

@Target({METHOD,TYPE}) @Retention(RUNTIME) public @interface Loader
Defines a custom SelectStatement to load the object with. Annotate a method, returning that type or Enum implementing ColumnInterface, where in second case, the statement will be constructed using object's table and provided constants as columns to get. By default, (if this annotation is missing), the object is loaded selecting columns defined by field names or ColumnsMapping if present.
